p: Phase I clinical trials have been published to assess 2 DNA vaccines encoding the pre-membrane and the envelope glycoprotein of the NY99 strain of WNV, in 2007 and 2011 (Martin et al., 2007; Ledgerwood et al., 2011). Both studies demonstrated safety and efficacy in inducing neutralizing antibodies in individuals who completed 2 or 3 doses of vaccination.
